model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Neighbors B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Neighbors A: I just visited this amazing new city. The architecture was stunning, the streets were so clean, and the people were very friendly.
Neighbors B: Sounds like you had a great time! Which city did you visit?
Neighbors A: It was Chicago. I had never been before, but it exceeded all my expectations.
Neighbors B: I bet it was a nice change of scenery from our neighborhood.
Neighbors A: Definitely. But you know, it's interesting how much our neighborhood has grown on me over the years. I remember when I first moved here, I was so unsure about it.
Neighbors B: Yeah, I remember. But you stayed because you wanted to be here.
Neighbors A: That's right. And since then, I've made so many great memories here. It's become my home.
Neighbors B: And you're still spending time with God every day, right?
Neighbors A: Yes, I am. It brings me so much peace and happiness.
Neighbors B: That's really admirable. And speaking of power, I remember you telling me about that time when you could make me do anything you wanted.
Neighbors A: Oh, gosh. That was so long ago. I can't even believe I had that kind of power over you.

[MEMORY]
Neighbor A has been living in the same place for a long time and enjoys the neighborhood and people there. This has led to Neighbor A valuing the relationship with Neighbors B and considering them like family. In return, Neighbors B has been living in the neighborhood for some time, is supportive of Neighbors A, and acknowledges Neighbor A's friendly and outgoing nature.

raw_prediction: Haha, it's all in good fun now. Times have definitely changed since then.
prediction:
Brief explanation: The MEMORY includes relevant information about the long-term relationship between Neighbor A and B. It provides explanation of their bond and their shared history in the neighborhood. Specifically, it could shed some insights on why Neighbor A had such influence on Neighbor B as mentioned in the DIALOGUE CONTEXT.
Judgement: "Yes"
